snippet: Chinese officials and preservationists have embarked on an ambitious effort to protect historic sites that could become a model for saving antiquities elsewhere.
abstract: Chinese officials and preservationists embark on ambitious effort to protect historic sites that could become a model for saving antiquities elsewhere; they have not only cleaned Buddhist statues in the cliffside caves of Datong, known as the Yungang Grottoes, and created a vast park, but also shutdown nearby coal mills and removed or regulated other sources of destructive air pollution.
lead_paragraph: Chinese officials and preservationists have embarked on an ambitious effort to protect historic sites that could become a model for saving antiquities elsewhere.

headline.main: Outlasting Dynasties, Now Emerging From Soot
headline.print_headline: Outlasting Dynasties, Now Emerging From Soot

keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
